description: Confirmation of the lawful erection of a detached two storey dwelling
decision_conditions: The erection of a detached two storey dwelling is lawful under section 191 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended), as the house ( 4 Fenton Close) has planning permission and had been built in accordance with the approved plans (APP/P5870/W/17/3169472 for the creation of four new, two-storey, four-bedroom detached dwellings  application Ref D2016/75885/FUL (Allowed) dated 19th June 2017. With subsequent permissions: D2017/78246, D2017/78272/FUL, DM2018/01261, DM2018/01062, DM2018/01084 and DM2021/00664.)
